about.p2: I am a Hungarian illustrator and motion designer living in Pecs
about.p3: I like to create playful images and animations with the use of both digital and traditional tools. I love bringing people's ideas to life and my goal is to concieve them as best as I possibly can.
about.p4: Aside from art, my two main interests are skateboarding and music and I would love to get an opportunity to work on anything related to them.
about.p5: I am available for freelance work so feel free to contact me with any idea. :)
